name: slice-fruits
description: A clone of a very popular iOS game.
author: Jannis R <mail@jannisr.de>

scripts.bundle: env NODE_ENV=production browserify -t es2020 -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] index.js > bundle.js
scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run minify
scripts.dev: env NODE_ENV=dev beefy index.js:bundle.min.js 3000 --live -- -t es2020 -t [ envify --NODE_ENV dev ]
